CustomField.description: Sums up the TRUE values in the Demographic Flags section, giving 1 point for each checkbox.
CustomField.formula: IF(Married_Flag__c = TRUE,1,0) + IF(Email_Listed_Flag__c = TRUE,1,0) + IF(Home_Phone_Listed_Flag__c = TRUE, 1,0) + IF(Business_Phone_Listed_Flag__c = TRUE,1,0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sums up the TRUE values in the Demographic Flags section, giving 1 point for each checkbox.
CustomField.label: Demographic Flags Score
